MS MCQs

    Understand your SharePoint site options - Summary and knowledge check

    »

    1. What is the purpose of communication sites?

      Communication sites are a content repository for collaboration by a group of people.

      Communication sites allow people to create and share recurring updates to a broad audience.

      Communication sites provide a connection point and central portal for a group of related sites.


    2. What are the three main building blocks to help you create your intranet?

      Team sites, hub sites, and communication sites

      Team sites, hub sites, and publishing sites

      Team sites, subsites, and Power BI sites


    3. Which is the recommended approach to creating and maintaining team sites?

      A self-service model where IT manages sites through reporting and automation.

       An IT-driven approach where site requests go through an approval workflow.

      An approach where site collection administrators manage a hierarchy of subsites.
